alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Windham County through 700 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Newfane, or near Townshend, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause flooding. Locations impacted include... Bellows Falls, Townshend, Putney, Saxtons River, Westminster, Newfane, Brookline, North Westminster, Simpsonville, South Newfane, East Dummerston, East Putney, West Dummerston, Westminster West, Townshend Dam, Williamsville, East Putney Station, Hadley Field, Dummerston Center and Putney Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
